title: I'm ?
description: I'm ? is a completely hand-drawn, non-generative NFT project on the NEAR Protocol. We are a completely transparent, fully community-run project with many plans for the future. 50% of mint proceed will go the DAO fund along with 50% of royalties from secondary sales. This DAO fund will not only be used to invest in I'm ? but will be used to invest in projects our holders recommend to us! We plan on holding community votes for these projects recommended by our holders and if majority votes yes… We will listen!

extraSections.text:
# Introducing **I'm ?**

I'm ? is a completely hand-drawn, non-generative NFT project on the NEAR Protocol. We are a completely transparent, fully community-run project with many plans for the future. 50% of mint proceed will go the DAO fund along with 50% of royalties from secondary sales. This DAO fund will not only be used to invest in I'm ? but will be used to invest in projects our holders recommend to us! We plan on holding community votes for these projects recommended by our holders and if majority votes yes… We will listen!
